1.content: You go to school and enter home room, you take a seat and set your lunchbox on the floor next to your desk. You put your hand on your cheek and look at Laura "A true image of beauty" you think. Suddenly you have a sudden thirst. You reach into your lunchbox and pull out a strange bottle of water. "Must be some weird juice..." You say to your self. You pop it open and take a drink suddenly everything around you is turning bigger, no...YOUR SHRINKING! Suddenly you look around and everything is GINORMUS! You are 1/7th of an inch. "Damn...this is the day I was going to tell Laura and Gaby I like them....what now?!?!
1.title: Shink...ALREADY?!?!

info.brief_description: Lifes not easy when your only 1/7 of an inch tall...
info.description:
You are Aaron a 12 year old boy in middle school (6th grade) one day he gets a strange bottle of water for lunch and drinks it then turns to 1/7 of an inch! But he has 2 crushes Laura and Gaby and he wants to tell them he likes them but how can he now that hes this small?!?!

Aaron: (You) A 12 year old boy with 2 girls he loves but he doesn't know if they love him back. hes likes adventure,Hes never had a girlfriend, He likes comedy and has a huge crush on Laura and Gaby

Laura: A HOOOTTTT Burnett. Shes smart, has a pretty big forehead, wears sandles (So you know, toe wedges), small but big breasts, skinny jeans and a great shaped and sized ass

Gaby: A HOOOTTT blonde. Shes pretty clueless but really funny, regular sized everything,wears sandles, great sized breasts,skinny jeans and am amazing ass!

NO NUDITY OR SEX!

ALSO NO OTHER GIANTESS OR GIANTS!
info.pretty_title: Shrunken with the ones you love
